qas.question: What peninsula is Bern located on?
What was built to help Bern grow bigger than the peninula?
What century did Bern outgrow the peninsula?

context: The city was originally built on a hilly peninsula surrounded by the River <a0_0>Aare<a0_0/>, but outgrew natural boundaries by the <a2_0>19th century<a2_0/>. A number of <a1_0>bridges<a1_0/> have been built to allow the city to expand beyond the Aare.
